TopicTitle: Official Weekly (Biweekly?) Spacecraft Exchange Showcase Thread

Articles.Content:
Easy: Crash it under the arch of the R&D - it squishes ANYTHING under it as it falls.

How do you plan on breaking the R&D building? Is Whack-A-Kerbal extra hardware?

How do you plan on breaking the R&D building? Is Whack-A-Kerbal extra hardware?

Does a Lynx high penetration I-beam lance count as extra hardware?

Alright everyone, sorry for no uploads (Youtube is blocked in China).

I will still record videos, but I cannot upload them until my stay is over at the end of summer

Dang Commies:(

And also, you could probably bring down the building just by ramming it. The R&D buildings are ridiculously fragile.
